cause.description:
Multiple myeloma, a cancer of the plasma cell, is an incurable but controllable disease. While a myeloma diagnosis can be overwhelming, it is important to remember that there are several promising new therapies that are helping patients live longer, healthier lives. The estimated frequency of multiple myeloma is 5-6 new cases per 100,000 persons per year.
1. Many people are unaware of this cancer
2. There is no apparent cure but it can be controlled
cause.name: Multiple Myeloma (UK & Global)
